serviceDescription: Saddle stitch is when single sheets of paper are printed on both sides, collated in page number order, folded in half and then stapled through the fold by a saddle stitch stapler.

With this binding method, the pages and cover are glued together at the spine with a strong yet flexible thermal glue. The other three sides of the book are then trimmed as needed to give them clean "perfect" edges.

The Wire-O binding method utilizes pre-formed pairs of wire loops that run along a C-shaped unit. These wire loops are inserted through holes that have been punched through the book's cover and pages.
Documents bound with spiral coils lay flat and the pages can turn 360 degrees around the flexible PVC coil spine. Coil binding is fast and easy and offers a wide variety of colors to choose from.

Cuts make a paper folder look attractive. The cuts in the folder makes, viewing the paper title easier. These type of die cut folders design is exclusive. Die cut presentation folder is used in high profile organizations.

Perfect for workbooks and other documents that need to lay flat when open, cerlox binding is a very cost-effective binding method. We offer cerlox binding solutions in a wide range of colours and sizes and can help you find the perfect fit for your document.
